pkgmetadata.longdescription: Support Functions for Time Series Analysis Book // Contains the support functions for the Time Series Analysis book. We present a function to calculate MSE and MAE for inputs of actual and forecast values. We also have the code for disaggregation as found in Wei and Stram (1990, doi:10.1111/j.2517-6161.1990.tb01799.x), and Hodgess and Wei (1996, "Temporal Disaggregation of Time Series").
